Dandelion Datatables 0.8.10 Release

  • By Thibault Duchateau
  • | 27 March 2013
  • | Comments
  • |
  • Dandelion-datatables
  • Design
  • news
  • release

Dandelion-Datatables v0.8.10 has been released in Maven Central.

The new release contains lots of new features, for both JSP and Thymeleaf. See the changelog for more details.

The other thing to mention is that we tried to integrate the awesome new design made by Gianni Polito. For now, only Dandelion-Datatables has been re-designed. Feel free to share any feedback in the forum!

For more information, see the dandelion-datatables’ changelog

As usual, there is a forum discussion for this blog post. As usual, your thoughts and feedback are very welcome. :-)
